title: Prime Produce
casualdescription: Designing, constructing, planning, facilitating, and practing a cooperative, intentional community for work.
role: co-organizing/co-programming a cooperative-driven intentional co-working guild for social good. Support structure for growing non-profits & social entrepreneurs, testing ground for 'social algorithms'. (Architectural design, budgeting, coordinating construction, programming, organizing, the whole shebang.)
